name: Mirror Force Launcher
description: Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can discard 1 monster; add 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck or GY to your hand. If this Set card is destroyed by your opponent's card effect and sent to your GY: You can Set this card from your GY and 1 "Mirror Force" from your hand, Deck, or GY. They can be activated this turn.
